column1: #Text=Katara says : " I have n't done this since I was a kid ! "
#Text=Aang says : " You still are a kid ! "
#Text=And a very bad memory for my people .
#Text=We 're not allowed to go near it !
#Text=" Aang says : " If you want to be a bender , you have to let go of fear .
#Text=" Katara says : " This ship has haunted my tribe since Gran - Gran was a little girl .
#Text=It was part of the Fire Nation 's first attacks .
#Text=I have friends all over the world , even in the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , how long were you in that iceberg ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=" Katara says : " I think it was more like a hundred years !
#Text=Do I look like a hundred - twelve - year - old man to you ?
#Text=You do n't know about it because , somehow , you were in there the whole time !
#Text=Maybe somehow there 's a bright side to all this ... " Aang says : " I did get to meet you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Come on , let 's get out of here .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , let 's head back , this place is creepy .
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's that you said about booby traps ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh oh ... Hold on tight !
